Text: Add a scroll bar to the entity panel (the panel on the right). It's useful when you have many mods that add items to it.
Paths are no longer highlighted when you select a building. You can still see them when selecting a path.
Choose a location for the tool description panel (the one in the middle when you are building). Game default: center.
Close all material counters (top-left corner) on start. Automatically expand any closed counter when you hover over them.
Never hide unlocked material counters even when you have 0 of that material.
When you select an object, all objects of the same type will be highlighted.
Color of the highlight for similar objects.
Highlight all the connected Tubeways when you select a Tubeway. This is useful to see the whole path of a Tubeway when you select it.

Hover over a material counter to highlight all buildings that contain that material. Clicking it will cycle through those buildings. Holding the Alternate key (default: Shift) will cycle through them in selecting district only.
For example, the chance of injury or a bee sting.
